topic.title: Eligibility
topic.shortdesc: Anyone is eligible for an internship, however internship eligibility varies by employer. Some offer internships to students who are freshmen, while others require a higher academic level.

body.p: Contact employers offering opportunities that you're interested in to determine if you qualify to apply.
Do some self-reflection as well when determining eligibility. Consider your course load for the semester as well as time you devote to extracurriculars to decide if you can manage an internship.
